channel.title: Joy Barlow on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Protecting people through partnerships: WithScotland Conference 2012
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm TW - Tom Wood BS - Beth Smith JB - Joy Barlow BD - Brigid Daniel Iriss.fm had the pleasure of attending the first WithScotland conference which was held at Stirling Management Centre on 25th October. Formerly the Scottish Childcare and Protection Network and the Multi-Agency Resource Service, respectively known as SCCPN and MARS - both organisations joined forces to become WithScotland in the summer of 2012.
